text:
$AAPL Warren Buffett makes over $120 billion on Apple’s rise to $3 trillion, among his best bets ever…

The 5% Apple stake Berkshire Hathaway acquired in 2018 for $36 billion is now worth $160 billion as the tech giant hit $3 trillion milestone.

Berkshire has also enjoyed regular dividends from Apple, averaging about $775 million annually.

Berkshire’s Apple stake now makes up more than 40% of its equity portfolio.
